Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IRoom, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Entrance

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand at the entrance to an enormous fenced-in burial ground. To the east, through rusted iron gates, you can see the grounds, and a beaten footpath leads west. The heavy foresting in the area greatly restricts movement in all other directions.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Northwest Corner

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the northwestern-most corner of the grounds. The lot is bounded by a tall (9 foot) wrought-iron fence which runs out of sight to the south and east. Through it, you can see lush foliage and a dark wall of trees.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Western Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking along the western edge of the graveyard. Through the fence to the west, you can see a thick forest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Exit

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: To the west of the spot where you stand is a large iron gate, through which you can see a footpath winding through the trees. A tall fence runs north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Western Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The grass upon which you walk is soft and springy, and tall weeds have sprouted up around you. This area is in a state of ill-repair - the fence is leaning outward here.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southwest Corner

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fence stops its southward movement, heading off to the east here. The wind from the south sweeps a woodsy aroma through the area, and the babble of water flowing over stones can be heard closeby to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Northern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fence runs east and west here, and through it, you see that the forest starts a dozen yards to the north.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There are numerous gravestones here - some set into the earth, some standing upright - and it is apparent that this the newest part of the cemetery. The entire area is overgrown with small weeds, and several tall elm trees grow here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There are more gravestones here, carved out of native granite, and slick with wet lichen. Some of the larger tombs have epitaphs on them.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ground grows hilly here, and the number of overturned gravestones increases. The sound of running water can be heard from the south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The iron picket fence runs east and west here, and through it can be seen a dark forested area. Flowing under the fence is a small brook, which tumbles downhill, heading roughly east. You notice that the soil is soggy.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Northern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking along the fence that runs east and west here. A pile of offal sits in the path, making the entire area reek. Also, you spot a partially eaten rat lying on a small rock to your right.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ground grows soggy here, and some gravestones seem to have sunk deeper into the soil. One has a small but interesting pictograph etched into it. A large pile of rocks, set up in a pyramid shape, sits off the path nearby.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An enormous pine tree grows here, its branches stretching out over your head. The ground under it is especially damp, and the air reeks of antiquity and death.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A faint sound - that of flowing water - can be heard to the south, and you begin to descend into a small dale. Judging from the height of the weeds in the area (almost 5 feet), you would guess it has been a long time since someone last visited this site.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small stream flows into this area from the west and meanders down a hill to the southeast. The soil is very soggy here, and you have problems keeping your movements quiet. You see no gravestones in this area.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Northern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: To the north, through the iron fence which runs east and west here, you can see the dark forest rising before you. It fills you with a sense of awe and wonder, seeming very much alive.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are standing amongst the tombstones in the middle of a sprawling graveyard. Some are large, up to 9 or 10 feet tall, some are small, but most are of average size. Weeds grow all around you, and slick algae cover the ground in patches.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Leaves crunch and twigs snap underfoot: there seems to be an excess of them, but no source is evident. A large hole gapes in the ground here, next to a pile of dirt. It is apparently a grave that was never filled.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking along a small footpath which winds amongst the tombstones. The air is foul, and you see the skeleton of a little creature of some sort laying in the tall grass.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the southern edge of the graveyard. The fence breaks open to the southwest, where a small weed-overgrown footpath winds into the dimly-lit forest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at the southern edge of the graveyard. The fence breaks open to the southwest, where a weed-overgrown trail winds into the dimly-lit forest. A small stream crosses your path, running southeast where it passes out under the fence.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Glade

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a secluded forest clearing. The whole area is very darkly shaded (being overshadowed by giant pines), and reeks of rot and decay. A mat of needles covers the ground, and a footpath leads northeast.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Northern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking along the northern fence, which runs east and west here. The dark forest to the north seems strangely alive and fills you with a sense of foreboding.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the heart of the graveyard. Tombstones of various sizes mark the spots of dozens of graves around you. Most are in a state of profound disrepair - either crumbling or bleaching out. Weeds grow tall all around.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ground here has given up its dead: a coffin lies overturned, with a skeletal hand protruding halfway out of it. The terrain itself is most bizarre - it looks as if an earthquake hit it.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A large rock sits off the path, amongst the gravestones, apparently used as a tomb marker by people who couldn't afford the real thing. The underbrush here grows wild, reaching almost 6 feet in places.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You stand atop a small grassy hill. The surrounding area is revealed to you: to the north, the cemetery stretches out before you, and directly to the south lies the southern edge. East and west, the grounds continue.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is the southern edge of the graveyard. The forest looms oppressively to the south, as seen through an iron fence running east to west. The faint sound of rushing water can be heard to the west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Northern Border

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is the northern border of the graveyard. The fence runs east and west here, and a break in it can be seen to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Graveyard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The majority of the gravestones here are very large (over 6 feet tall), and appear to be eroded and weather-beaten. This is apparently an ancient section of the graveyard.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard Site

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The gravestones turn into monuments, some reaching as high as 12 feet. However, all seem very old and eroded, with much of their intricate detail destroyed.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small secluded spot to the east of dismal swamplands. Tall weeds grow all about, and patches of moss cover the ground in various places.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Vast Graveyard

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A small mausoleum stands here, marking the burial spot of some unknown family lineage. Weeds grow up all around it. The door is made of slate.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Border

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is the southern border of the graveyard. The wrought iron fence runs north and west here, and the foreboding forest sits not 15 feet behind it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Vast Graveyard, Northern Border

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The fence which runs east and west here has been broken open, revealing a tiny footpath leading north into the heart of the forest. To the east, the ground grows soggy.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your footing grows dangerous; many of the gravestones, mostly tall ones, have sunk partially or fully into the ground. To the west, you view a sea of tombstones, and to the east, the land turns into a swampy nightmare.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard Site

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Several large gravestones remain here, covered with slimy moss, but the majority have been swallowed up by the soft earth. To the east, the land turns into a quagmire.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ground is still safe to walk on, but you notice that there are no grave markers anywhere in the area. To the east, the land becomes a morass.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Southern Border

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is the southern edge of the safe part of the graveyard. You may proceed east, into the swampy expanse, but to do so would mean almost certain tragedy.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Weed Overgrown Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The ground in this area is unusually soggy, and the footing is difficult. Reeds and ferns grow all around you. To the west, the land becomes firmer, but to the south and east are full-blown swamplands.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Eastern Border, Overgrown Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This area is an actual marsh, complete with an assortment of water flora and swampland trees. It seems that with each footstep, you sink further into the muck. To the south and east, the swamp continues; westward is firmer ground.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are trudging through a bog. There are hidden pitfalls everywhere, and the footing is hazardous. To the north, south, and east, the mire continues. Westward, however, the ground becomes firmer.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Your very life is in peril as you enter this area. Northward, southward, and eastward the swamp continues, and firmer ground lies westward.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are on a dangerous stretch of land. To continue southward or eastward would mean certain death. To the north, the mire continues, and you see the firmer ground to the west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Graveyard, Small Secluded Section

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The forest grows in this area, and giant gravestones (15-20 feet tall) are scattered about. The dim light filters through the branches above, making the scene very eerie. You may go south, east, or southwest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Crypt Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Many large gravestones sprout from the ground all around you, and a small crypt sits under the branches of a nearby tree. You may continue north, east, or northwest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secluded Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This area is choked by forest underbrush, and the air smells strongly of the scent of pines. Tombstones peek out from beneath the foliage. You may go south, east, or west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secluded Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a crypt towering before you, some 18 feet tall, with steps leading up to its door. The air reeks of musk and rot. You see gravestones northward, eastward, and westward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secluded Area

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: An enormous oak tree rises amongst the stones here, giving the scene a rustic look. Its branches cast a shadow over the entire area.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secluded Dell

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The secluded feeling one gets from being in this area is overwhelming - all sounds are deadened by the oppressive gloom of the forest. You may go south, east, or west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secluded Spot

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: There is a small crypt sitting in the area, its grey slate walls stained by the passage of time. The trees above filter the dim light, making strange shadows all around. You may go south or west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secluded Spot, Pine Cluster

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the southeastern corner of this small section of the graveyard. A cluster of pines shades the many tombstones present. You may go north or west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Entry Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small chamber of carved rock, with a stonework floor. The dust on the floor is thick and undisturbed, and the air smells dank. A staircase leads upward to bright sunlight, and a dark passage leads east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secret Passage, Bend

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are at a bend in the passage. To the south, you see a small chamber of carved stone, and eastward the corridor continues. The dusty floor shows the tracks of small animals. The air is very stale.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secret Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a secret room, carved out of the solid rock. The dust on the floor is inches thick, and the air smells faintly of rot. A heap of bones fills one corner of the room. You may go north or east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Passageway, Bend

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have reached another bend in the secret passage. To the north, the corridor opens up into a room, and the passageway continues to the west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Vaulted Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a chamber with a vaulted ceiling. Faint tracks mark the dusty floor between the two openings (to the east and south), and the air smells faintly of vanilla.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Catacomb Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking along a relatively wide east/west passageway. The north and south walls have many openings in them (3x2x6 feet deep), some of which have been sealed up with red bricks and mortar. Those which haven't been are empty.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Catacomb Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The high-vaulted passageway continues, and you see many more openings in the north and south walls, all of which have been bricked up. Additionally, you notice that the fetid air smells of ancient death.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Catacomb Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: To the east, the passageway opens up into a huge room. There are fewer bricked-up openings here, and the dusty floor shows evidence of frequent comings and goings. The air reeks of fetid death.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Huge Gallery

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a giant gallery with a high-vaulted domed ceiling, and identical passages which exit in all directions. The walls are covered with ancient frescoes and runes, and the air reeks of death and decay.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Level Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a passage with the floor carved level. A trail in the dust runs the length of the corridor to the southwest through the only exit.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are standing in a small square room with an unlocked wooden door in the south wall. The air smells of vanilla, and the dust on the floor shows signs of disturbance.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Enlongated Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This elongated room has a low ceiling made of carved rock and a floor splattered with some strange dark fluid. A door sits in the north wall. An inscription in the latter glows an eerie green in the gloom.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The floor of this passageway is heavily coated with dust, and the air reeks of decay. A skeleton lies on the floor in tattered leathers. The walls show signs of pickaxes, probably used to create body internment chambers.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a long room with smooth stone walls. A clicking sound echoes through the chamber. Three identical passages lead east, northeast and southeast.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Long Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This passageway has smooth squarish stones on the west wall, with the others of rough stone. A thin layer of moss hangs from the walls and ceiling. The floor is dusty, and the air reeks of decay. You may go northeast.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Irregular Cave

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is an irregular cave of native rock. The walls and floor are covered with bright multi-colored mosses (blue, green, red, pastel yellow). A small empty box lies in the center of the room. You may go north.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Smooth Passage

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This passage has a smooth floor and walls. You may exit to the northeast. A series of odd grooves have been cut diagonally into the east wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Lit Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The room is lit by phosphorescent algae, which cover the walls and ceiling. A broken bow lies in two pieces in the center of the room. You also see a narrow hole in the ceiling and an exit which lies to the southwest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Reeking Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The air in this chamber reeks of spoiled and rotten matter. A strip of cloth sticks out from under a pile of rocks in the northwest corner. You may go west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small room with a low ceiling. The body internment chambers occupy the north, south, and east walls, most of which have been bricked up. One brick has disintegrated, revealing a poorly shrouded mummy.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Entry Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small cubical room. A passageway exits through an archway to the east, and a staircase spirals upward. The air is dank, reeking of mold, and cobwebs fill every crack and corner of the room.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Frescoed Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This passageway heads off to the east into the gloom, and a small door leads southward. Strange frescoes and hieroglyphs cover the walls, and the dust on the floor is several inches thick.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Etched Corridor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The air is heavy and stale in this north/south corridor, making breathing difficult. Intricate etchings cover the walls, and the floor shows few signs of disturbance. An arched opening exits eastward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Facial Etchings Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are about halfway down a corridor which continues to the north and south. Faces, many with startling detail, have been etched into the west wall. An arched opening leads eastward into darkness.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Passageway, Southern End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This the southern end of the passageway; you may go north or exit through a tall archway to the east. The carved stone floor shows no signs of disturbance.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Catacomb Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The passageway continues east and west here. Openings in both northern and southern walls prove to be body internment chambers, but most have been sealed with red bricks and mortar (and those which haven't aren't occupied).

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Catacomb Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking down a dusty east/west corridor. Many holes in the north and south walls serve as body internment chambers, and most of these are bricked up. The air grows increasingly putrid to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small room has been cut out of packed earth. A gateway leads west, into a passageway. The air smells faintly of vanilla, and the floor is dusty and undisturbed.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Slaughter Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small room, with an opening in the west wall. Strewn across the floor are the grisly remains of a goblin in rusty chainmail, still freshly slain. Bloodstains and scratches cover the walls and floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dark Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room is unusually dark, even with the aid of your torch. Eerie shadows dance all around you, some reaching to the ceiling. An exit lies westward, into a better-lit passageway.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dripping Passage

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You reach the eastern extremity of the passageway. A strange shiny substance covers the walls and drips from the ceiling. An old boot lies near a mound of earth near the middle of this area.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Catacomb Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The northern and southern walls of this east/west passage are riddled with body internment chambers, most of which are bricked up. The floor is dusty and undisturbed, and the air is really smelling bad.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Crypt Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The corridor here opens up into a large room to the east and continues to the west. The floor is covered with the spoor of large animals. Several goblin bodies lie on the floor, each in a pool of blood.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You walk into a large chamber with walls that curve up and inward. The ceiling is undetectable due to a thick lingering fog higher up, and the floor shows frequent usage. Passages lead east and west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Axe-Scarred Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room shows the signs of mining operations - pickaxe marks scar the north and south walls. The air is heavy, and the floor is dusty, yet disturbed. Passages lead east and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Tapestry Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The walls of this room are covered with rotting tapestries that hang from iron hooks. A passage heads northward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dark East/West Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This dark east/west dirt passageway has been recently excavated, as tool marks would indicate. You see a small hole in the ceiling, possibly nine feet up. The area is littered with mining tools and seems to have been deserted.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Cave

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small cave has a leveled floor and smooth walls. The exits in the east and west walls have been carved through packed dirt. The air is dank smelling, and the floor has no dust on it.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Cubical Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a small cubical room, recently carved out of packed earth. Exits lie east and westward. The air is stiflingly hot and dank-smelling, and a thin layer of dust coats the floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Passage

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a small passage with a level floor. Tools lie abandoned and scattered haphazardly about. The floor has no dust on it, and the air smells of musk and sweat. You can go eastward or southwest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Dead End

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This passage was never completed; you can only turn back east. The dust has accumulated on the rough floor.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Caved-In Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small room has been carved out of tightly-packed earth. The ceiling in the southeast corner of the room has collapsed, covering the area with rubble. A skeletal arm protrudes from under a large rock. A passage leads northwest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Pit Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a circular room with an exit leading west. It appears that the floor has fallen through as a large, dark pit, some eight feet across, gapes in front of you. A foul reek emanates from down inside.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Vacant Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This room seems to have been used recently. The floor, while not dusty to begin with, has been much disturbed in the southeast corner. A roughly-hewn corridor leads westward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Entry Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You have entered a small room, cubical in shape, with smooth walls and a floor carved level. Passages exit to the north, south, and east, and a staircase spirals upward. The dust on the floor is thick and undisturbed.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Alcove

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This small alcove is apparently chipped out of solid stone. The dust on the floor is several inches thick, and the air is putrid and stale. A passage leads south, and a staircase descends into darkness.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Secret Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small secret chamber, which has been cut out of the solid rock. Faintly glowing runes cover parts of the walls, but they are very worn. A passage goes eastward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The dusty floor of this room is marked with the tracks of large animals, and the air smells of musk. A cleanly picked skeleton reclines against the east wall. A passage heads back southward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Chamber

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small chamber with a smooth floor, walls, and ceiling. Large black stains are evident near the eastern wall, and a passage leads north and south.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The air in this passageway grows unbearable, and the amount of dust underfoot causes you to choke. The east and west walls are covered with small etchings and carvings. The passage continues north and south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Passage

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The passage ends here; you can only go north. However, carved into the southern wall is a large (6-foot diameter) face. Its open mouth leaves a small dark hole in the wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Small Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The walls, floor, and low ceiling of this room are stonework. Cobwebs fill every crack and crevice, and a pile of partially eaten and unrecognizable bodies fills the southwest corner. You can only go back westward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: East/West Passageway

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The passageway opens up into a medium-sized room to the east and goes back west. The floor here is covered with dust, but a faint trail is visible. The air reeks of rot.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Wedge-Shaped Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a wedge-shaped room, whose ceiling slopes gradually to meet the floor in the eastern corner. The air is heavy and smells of decaying flesh, and the floor is undisturbed. A passage goes back west.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Ocean Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You walk down a short passage and exit out onto a small stretch of sandy beach in a small cove. The crystal blue sea water laps up onto the shore. A dark hole in the cliff wall leads back to the southeast.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Desert Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the middle of a vast desert. The sun beats down from the blue sky overhead, and the wind howls furiously, blowing sand into your eyes. A portal, open in mid-air, exits to the east.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Large Circular Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: This is a large circular room, with a staircase winding upward. Identical passages exit in all directions, save the northeast. Through these, all manner of natural sounds can faintly be heard. A strange message sits on the wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Plateau Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are on an enormous plateau, several dozen yards across, and several thousand feet up. The high winds buffet you, making balance difficult. A valley stretches out below your feet, and a portal opens to the south.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Forest Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in the middle of a lush coniferous forest. Tall pines and birches reach toward the bright sun above; the air is fresh and clean. Thick undergrowth prevents movement in all directions save one: northeast.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Mountainous Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are standing on a precipice, overlooking a vast range of snow-capped mountains. The ledge extends for about 15 feet, then turns into a sheer drop-off. The air is fresh; the wind blows. A small tunnel leads northward.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Plains Scene

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are standing in the middle of a vast prairie. A sea of tall grass grows in all directions, and dances in the slight breeze. The air is fresh here, and the ground is moist. A portal in mid-air opens to the northwest.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Narrow Passage

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a narrow stone passageway, which dead-ends to the east. A large round room lies back to the west. The floor is dusty, and the air is foul.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Secret Room

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are in a small room, obviously carved out of the solid rock. A small staircase leads down into darkness, and a passage leads back southward. From below, many different noises can be discerned.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Lair Of Jaldi'al

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are standing in thick underbrush. Tropical vegetation and trees abound, and the place is filled with the sounds of life. The air is hot and humid. A climb upward can be accomplished with the use of a vine.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Forest Path

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are walking along a thickly overgrown north/south forest path. The light grows dim, and the air feels heavy as you walk further northward. The place is dead silent, so much so that it is oppressive.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Forest Path

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The path continues here, getting narrower. The trees loom above you, blocking out all but a few rays of sunlight. The air is heavy and makes breathing difficult.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: East/South Path

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: The path turns sharply eastward here and continues to the south. To the east, you can barely make out a thinning in the trees.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Clearing, Edge

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You are standing at the western edge of a large clearing. A path leads west, back into the dark forest, and crypts lie to the northeast and southeast. The air is better here, yet still strangely putrid.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
